name: Illusive Deed
description:
This short game was made in 4 days for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1. 

Use SPACEBAR to swap at will between a 2D combat focused game and a 3D puzzle game which affect each other!

Illusive Deed is, for now, a proof of concept featuring an original core game mechanic: the alternation between 2D and 3D perspectives. 

So... what is real?  

- On 2D you are an adventurer exploring a mysterious dungeon. Fight your way until the end!
- On 3D you have total control of the dungeon. Move and change all the pieces at will! 

Featuring:

- 5 short levels (more to come!)
- 2 types of enemies (more to come!)
- 1 dungeon block (more to come!)
- Original dynamic music that swaps between a chiptune and an orchestral OST

Thank you for playing!
We were so low on time, but we all had a blast and learned so much!  :)

CREDITS:

Art @Sky1e

Music and Sfx @Bugs_bugz
